column1: EVTDESC_DUELACTION_200;Your enemy launches a depsperate attack. Too weak to parry their blow
column2: you feel the steel of their blade slice you open
column3: recieving [From.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage. Warm blood stains your clothing and you fall to the ground
column4: the life draining from your body. Hearing your enemy's roar of triumph
column5: you give in to the icy grip of death
column6: contemplating the mistakes you have made.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_DUELACTION_201;As you press your advantage upon your enemy
column2: you can feel your blows sapping their strength. Launching your final attack
column3: you deal them [Root.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage and cut through their armor
column4: severing their torso in two. Letting out a ferocuious bellow
column5: you sginal your victory to the onlookers and challenge another to take the place of your opponent. None step forward.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_DUELACTION_202;You managed to escape from certain death at the hands of your enemy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_DUELACTION_202;I must get away from here!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

ACTION_WIZARD_ATTACK_CANTRIP-ATTACK_TOOLTIP; This spell has a cast value of 10.
 Your spell cast calculation is d20+[Root.wcl.GetValue].
 This Spell damage equal to 1d3+([Root.wcl_sp.GetValue]/5)d3+[Root.wcl_sp.GetValue].
 If this Spell is resisted
column2: the damage done is halved.\n This spell is an Attack type Action.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: ACTION_WIZARD_DEFEND_CANTRIP-COUNTER_TOOLTIP;This Spell is automatically cast.\n This spell increases your defense score by [Root.wcl_sp.GetValue]+10 for this round of combat.\n This spell is a Counter type Action. ;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

ACTION_WIZARD_STONE-SKIN_CANTRIP-BUFF_TOOLTIP; This spell has a cast value of 15.
 Your spell cast calculation is d20+[Root.wcl.GetValue].
 This spell will grant a damage reduction of 2+([Root.wcl_sp.GetValue]/5) for a duration of 1+[Root.wcl_sp.GetValue]
 You currently have a damage reduction of [Root.wizard_ss_pot.GetValue] which will expire in [Root.wizard_ss_count.GetValue] rounds.
 This Spell is a Buff type Action.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
